message: I understand you want to divide fairly, but inflation hurts me more. Let's reverse our positions from the last round.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more, but still a good deal for you
This offer accounts for the fact that inflation is impacting both of us, let's close this deal.
Inflation is hitting you harder, my share goes up
Alice, let's be real, this back and forth is pointless. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at the value even more.
